recent_activities.title: Presenting at ICT-CEEL 2023
recent_activities.description: Presented our paper, 'Automation of Driving License Test Using Computer Vision and Image Processing,' at ICT-CEEL 2023, held by Khwopa Engineering College and IEEE PES, October 11–13, 2023. Won Best Paper Award.

recent_activities.title: Winning All Nepal Hackathon 2023
recent_activities.description: Led Vision Architects to first place in the All Nepal Hackathon 2023 (e-Governance category) with a computer vision-based driving license test automation project.

recent_activities.title: Car and Sidelight Detection with YOLOv5
recent_activities.description: Developed a custom YOLOv5 model for real-time car and sidelight detection, achieving 95% mAP, integrated into the CarSight prototype.

recent_activities.title: National TV Interview on Kantipur Television
recent_activities.description: Featured on Kantipur TV as team leader of Vision Architects post-Hackathon win, discussing our computer vision driving license automation project.

recent_activities.title: Google Play Store App Analysis
recent_activities.description: Analyzed Google Play Store app data using Python, Pandas, and Seaborn to identify trends in performance and ratings.

recent_activities.title: Website Development: FootBalance Nepal
recent_activities.description: Built and deployed a responsive Flask-based website for FootBalance Nepal, hosted on Render.

Data Analysis.title: Analysis of Nobel Prize Winners
Data Analysis.description: Explored trends in Nobel Prize data using Python and visualization tools.

Data Analysis.description: Analyzed app performance and ratings with Pandas and Seaborn.

Data Analysis.title: Popularity of Programming Languages
Data Analysis.description: Analyzed Stack Overflow data to rank programming language popularity, highlighting Python’s dominance.

Data Analysis.title: Seaborn and Linear Regression
Data Analysis.description: Applied Seaborn and linear regression to movie budget data from the-numbers.com.

Backend and API Development.description: Developed a Flask-based website with Jinja templating, hosted on Render.

Backend and API Development.description: Built a bot to notify users of flight price drops using Tequila, Sheety, and Twilio APIs.

Backend and API Development.description: Created a demo REST API with Flask for learning purposes.

Backend and API Development.description: Automated gameplay in Cookie Clicker using Python and Selenium.

Backend and API Development.title: Flutter Website
Backend and API Development.description: Built my first website using Flutter and Dart, hosted on Render.
